name: LeoTam.GitHub.io
tagline: Not all who wander are lost
body:
### Welcome to Leo's Github Page
My interests are deep learning, image analysis and signal processing.  Please feel free to check out my publications via [Google Scholar](http://www.tinyurl.com/scholarLeo).

### Deep learning
My main experience here was using a convolutional neural network to perform automatic diagnosis of diabetic retinopathy as part of a competition sponsored by the California Healthcare Foundation and Kaggle.  We used a package based off of @soumith Torch implementation for ImageNet.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
